import { useState } from 'react'; import Navbar from './Navbar.js' import { Button, Card } from 'react-bootstrap'; import Dog from './dog.png' var rootStyle = { backgroundColor : '#6abaf3', color : 'white', height : '100%' } const Team = () => { const [team] = useState([ { name: 'Andrew', position: 'Chief Exec Officer' }, { name: 'Will', position: 'Hardware Team' }, { name: 'Ally', position: 'Hardware Team' }, { name: 'Omkaar', position: 'Software Team Member' }, { name: 'Aditya', position: 'Software Team Member' }, { name: 'Chance', position: 'Software Team Member' }, ]) return (

The Memory Glass Team

{team.map((team) => (

{team.name}

{team.position}
))}
); } export default Team;
